title: How To Train Your Dog To Not Beg At The Table
summary: When your dog is a puppy, it’s important to set boundaries and rules for them to follow. It can help prevent bad habits from forming or getting worse. Don’t reward bad behavior with food. Instead, try to redirect your dog to do something good, like sitting or giving it a toy to play with. Clicker training is a great way to teach your dog the meaning of “no” and other commands, like to sit or lay down. Use a clicker app on your phone to make the clicking sounds for you.
